page.title: 12SPORT CENTRE (1)
page.content: On Saturday I get up at seven o'clock, get dressed and have my breakfast. I call for Darren at two 0'clock and we get the bus to the George H. Carnell Centre. It is fourty pence to get in. At half past two it starts and we play football until three. Our team usually wins.Then we go on the bouncy castle. They let the babies on first, then the fours and fives and then anyone. We play squash then, which I usually win. When we go for lunch at the cafe inside the centre we have sausage on a balm cake. We then maybe go to the exersize room. We like to go to the movie room to watch some cartoons. My favourites are Mickey and Donald. We enjoy watching the swimmers in the pool who jump in and dive from the board.
